I got this opening "c:\cygwin\usr\include\expat.h" in the editor and trying to
scroll the outline view.  It also happens when double-clicking in the members
view of the c browsing perspective.

Fix in the CDT ... but this is troubling.  I think it is legal to
open an editor whitout an AnnotationModel, in this case should
not the ProjectionViewer make sure by calling
ProjectionViewer.isProjectMode()
before accessing fProjectionAnnotationModel field.

Redirecting the question to the UI folks
